Remove the jammed paper from the MP tray. 2) If this jam error occurs frequently, check the rollers of the MP unit. a) Check if MP pick up/ reverse/ forward rollers are assembled correctly. b) If the MP pick up/ reverse/ forward rollers are worn out or contaminated, replace the defective roller(JC93–00540A). 3) If the problem persists, check if the MP solenoid operates correctly. a) Enter SVC mode. (Diagnostics > Engine Diagnostics > Engine Test Routines > 100-0000) b) Remove the rear cover. c) Check if the motor harness is connected correctly. d) If the problem occurs, replace the main drive unit(JC93-00912A).
